name: MANSNOG
description:
I was once scrolling through YouTube when I stumbled upon this video.

Ever since the word "MANSNOG" has been stuck in my head.

Flash forward a month or two and I'm trying to come up with an idea for a game.

Then I basically went "fuck it" and made this.

-

Contains:

  • 5 stages
  • 5 bosses
  • kinda high difficulty
  • some traps
  • some spikes
  • some jumping

and probably more!

also the kid's cape is purple now

just cuz
